meanings.definition: Relating to or performed by means of a hysteroscope.
meanings.sent1: The hysteroscopic procedure was painless and quick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often use hysteroscopic tools to examine the uterus.
meanings.sent3: During the hysteroscopic exam, the tiny camera made the uterus look like a movie set!
meanings.sent4: Her hysteroscopic view of the uterus revealed secrets hidden within.
meanings.sent5: The hysteroscopic device illuminated the uterus like a spotlight on a stage.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the examination of the uterus using a hysteroscope.
meanings.sent1: The hysteroscopic test provided detailed images of the uterus.
meanings.sent2: The hysteroscopic examination helped diagnose the issue accurately.
meanings.sent3: The hysteroscopic view of the uterus was surprisingly clear and fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her hysteroscopic exploration of the uterus was like a journey into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The hysteroscopic procedure painted a vivid picture of the uterus's inner workings.
